name: Traffic Racer on Bend Roads
description:
Real driving experience on bends road with heavy traffic for Masters!

What about the real driving experience with fast cars?

This game is not Classic Traffic Racer much more than it!

If you are bored by straight roads, you can show your mastery on curved, disabled roads. You can pass through challenging sections against time.

Do not forget all of the cars in traffic are a traffic monster, your job will not be easy :)

You can graduate from our driving school by completing levels with Real Race Simulation, which is among the car simulation games.

Some Features:

- 3 Different driving experience;

1- Buttons
2- Steering Wheel
3- Accelerometer

- 3 Different camera modes
- Slow motion feature

- Some features found by the power of vehicles:

1- NOS
2- Turbo
3- ABS
4- ESP

- New levels, cars, buses, trucks will be added.

*** Enjoy!
